chapters.title: Prologue: By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Elenar, p. 43—Aiel apprentice, in training under the tutilage of Hayde and Shanni. She is of the Daryne Aiel. Amys recommends asking her to verify Aviendha's visions from the second trip through the crystal columns of Rhuidean. This idea is rejected; the Wise Ones think it unwise or unfair to ask her to do such a task.
